original_text: When the Israelites became stronger, they made the Canaanites work for them as slaves. But they never completely chased the Canaanites out from those towns.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손이 강성한 후에야 가나안 족속에게 노역을 시켰고 다 쫓아내지 아니하였더라

sentences.original_text: they made the Canaanites work for them as slaves
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 가나안 사람들을 노예로 삼아 자기들을 위해 일하게 했다

sentences.original_text: But they never completely chased the Canaanites out
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그들은 가나안 사람들을 완전히 쫓아내지 않았다
